spells.name: test
spells.desc: testing 1, 2...

spells.name: fly
spells.desc: creative flight in radius from casting position

spells.name: water
spells.desc: create water at cursor

spells.name: lava
spells.desc: create lava at cursor

spells.name: drain
spells.desc: drain liquid at cursor

spells.name: smelt
spells.desc: smelt everything 1 block around at cursor (change to: smelt <range> - smelts everyting withing range around cursor)

spells.name: size
spells.desc: <0.0> - change your size

spells.name: eat
spells.desc: drinks health potion

spells.name: altiora
spells.desc: casts altiora on you

spells.name: altiora_cassette
spells.desc: enqueues cassette that grants you altiora if you hold [Call Telepathy] and [Space]

spells.name: lightning
spells.desc: summon lightning at cursor

spells.name: explode
spells.desc: summon explosion of set strenght an cursor

spells.name: light
spells.desc: conjure light on cursor

spells.name: extinguish
spells.desc: extinguishes area near cursor

spells.name: hextito
spells.desc: [<params>] - creates hextito containing command

spells.name: fix
spells.desc: [<amount of media>] - fixes or fills item with media. If no argument is passed, uses, in order: main hand durability, offhand durability, default of 640 media. Ignores durability for items that doesn't have it. Does not check for Mending. Returns unused amethyst to mote.

spells.name: impulse
spells.desc: boost self in looked direction with strenght 2

spells.name: bonemeal
spells.desc: bonemeal on top of looked at block

spells.name: save
spells.desc: save spell in focus to targeted shelf with provided name

spells.name: read
spells.desc: print name of spell in targeted shelf

spells.name: read_loud
spells.desc: show the name of the spell in targeted shelf in bold letters in the middle of your screen

spells.name: rename
spells.desc: change name of item on cursor to provided one (can be with spaces)

spells.name: tp
spells.desc: teleport to gate in hand

spells.name: noetic
spells.desc: teleport to dimension. WARNING: DD TELEPORTS YOU ON TOP OF BEDROCK SO IT IS WIP

spells.name: acad
spells.desc: Akashic CAD, starts a cassette that casts chosen spell when you hold [Telepathy] and press [RMB]. Shows name of CAD'ed spell and amount of media you have over your hotbar.

spells.name: start
spells.desc: starts casting the spell every 10 ticks via cassette.

spells.name: stop
spells.desc: stops casting spell started by 'start'

spells.name: fuck_phantoms
spells.desc: targets all phantoms in radius and explodes them once

requested.name: scaffold
requested.desc: conjure volatile block (when one block is destroyed, all conected blocks are destroyed)

requested.name: edify
requested.desc: edify sapling on top of targeted block face

requested.name: tp
requested.desc: teleport to gate with selected name

requested.name: list
requested.desc: lists values of dictionaries (pigments, gates etc.)
